name: Person of Air
uniques: Heal this unit by [15] HP <upon ending a turn in a [Mountain] tile>

name: Exaltation
uniques: Doing so will consume this opportunity to choose a Promotion

name: Lunar Hymns
uniques: Heal this unit by [10] HP <upon ending a turn in a [All] tile> <when adjacent to a [Cleric] unit>

name: Moon Power
uniques: Enables [All] units to enter ocean tiles <upon ending a turn in a [All] tile>
